modName: Non quest locations for Stones of Barenziah
summary: Moves Stones of Barenziah to non quest locations
descriptionHtml:
It is weird, that you must do some quest, join faction or even buy house to get all Stones of Barenziah. This roleplay game, so game should't to force you to do it.

I moved locations of three Barenziah Stones to near orginal places. WARNING! contain spoilers of four stones locations

Stone from Dark Brotherhood sanctuary is moved to Jarl's house in Falkreath
Stone from Arc Mages quarter is moved to jarl's house in Winterhold
Stone from buyable house Proudspire Manor is moved to Bard's College

Stone in Thalmor Embassy is already moved by Unofficial Skyrim mod to cave under Embassy, so I didn't touched that one. Recommend to download it, if you don't want to continue Main Quest.

Enjoy

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/414285]gnarly1[/url] made [i]"Prowler's Profit - Immersive Clues to the Stones of Barenziah"[/i], where you search them with clues, and he made compatible patch too for this mod. I recommend to use it.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59475/?
author: Globox68 - Twili
